sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_prfrd_tables.PreferredTableAjaxUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PreferredTableAjaxUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PreferredTableAjaxUtil = Class.create();
PreferredTableAjaxUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(
	global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,
	{
		isValidTableRecord: function () {
			var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_table_name');
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
			gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
			gr.query();
			if (gr.hasNext()) {
				return true;
			}
			return false;
		},
		type: 'PreferredTableAjaxUtil',
	}
);
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-11-09 10:20:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1420c1797783511031e3b3c64b5a997d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PreferredTableAjaxUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Preferred tables" source="sn_prfrd_tables">de7c09b877e2111031e3b3c64b5a994a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Preferred tables">de7c09b877e2111031e3b3c64b5a994a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1420c1797783511031e3b3c64b5a997d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-11-09 10:20:25</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
